channel.title: Next IATI Steering Committee 15-16 October 2014
channel.description:
The next Steering Committee meeting will take place on 15-16 October 2014 at UN City in Copenhagen, Denmark. There will be a Partner Country Caucus on 14 October, also in Copenhagen. - See more at: http://www.aidtransparency.net/governance/steering-committee#sthash.rqTSCrKi.dpuf
The agenda is filling up quickly, and so if the CSO group want to make representations to have items added to the agenda, we need to start now.
Please use this topic to add your ideas and comments. For example, I'd like to see us present best practice for donor governments who are planning on requiring NGOs to use IATI, and potential benefits that NGOs bring to IATI data, for example traceability.
